title: Certified Kubernetes Security Specialist (CKS)
description: Master Kubernetes security with hands-on scenarios covering all CKS exam domains. Practice real-world security implementations, hardening techniques, and threat detection.

steps.title: Course Overview
steps.text: Welcome to the comprehensive CKS preparation course with 21 hands-on scenarios.

scenarios.title: Cluster Setup (15%)
scenarios.description: Master RBAC, Network Policies, and Security Contexts

courses.title: RBAC Configuration and Management
courses.description: Learn to implement Role-Based Access Control in Kubernetes clusters

courses.title: Network Policies Implementation
courses.description: Configure network segmentation and traffic control

courses.title: Security Contexts and Pod Security
courses.description: Implement pod-level security configurations

scenarios.title: Cluster Hardening (15%)
scenarios.description: Secure API Server, Nodes, and Encrypt etcd

courses.title: API Server Security Hardening
courses.description: Configure secure API server settings and authentication

courses.title: Kubernetes Node Security
courses.description: Implement node-level security configurations

courses.title: etcd Encryption at Rest
courses.description: Configure encryption for sensitive data in etcd

scenarios.title: System Hardening (10%)
scenarios.description: Kernel Security and Container Runtime Protection

courses.title: Kernel Security and Syscall Filtering
courses.description: Implement kernel-level security controls

courses.title: AppArmor and Seccomp Profiles
courses.description: Configure application and syscall security profiles

scenarios.title: Minimize Microservice Vulnerabilities (20%)
scenarios.description: Pod Security, Admission Controllers, and Secrets Management

courses.title: Pod Security Standards
courses.description: Implement Pod Security Standards and policies

courses.title: Custom Admission Controllers
courses.description: Deploy and configure admission webhooks

courses.title: Secrets Management and Encryption
courses.description: Secure secrets handling and external secret management

courses.title: Container Image Security
courses.description: Implement container security best practices

scenarios.title: Supply Chain Security (20%)
scenarios.description: Image Scanning, Signing, and Policy Enforcement

courses.title: Container Image Vulnerability Scanning
courses.description: Implement automated image security scanning

courses.title: Image Signing and Verification
courses.description: Configure image signing with Cosign and verification

courses.title: OPA Gatekeeper Policies
courses.description: Deploy and manage OPA Gatekeeper for policy enforcement

courses.title: Binary Authorization and Attestation
courses.description: Implement binary authorization for secure deployments

scenarios.title: Monitoring, Logging and Runtime Security (20%)
scenarios.description: Runtime Detection, Audit Logging, and Incident Response

courses.title: Falco Runtime Security Monitoring
courses.description: Deploy and configure Falco for runtime threat detection

courses.title: Kubernetes Audit Logging
courses.description: Configure comprehensive audit logging and analysis

courses.title: Behavioral Anomaly Detection
courses.description: Implement anomaly detection for security monitoring

courses.title: Security Incident Response
courses.description: Practice incident response procedures and forensics
